name: intelligent-situation-automation-app
description: Intelligent Situation Automation is an extension of Situation Handling. It processes situations raised and resolves them automatically using business rules, thus reducing the time users spend on routine manual and repetitive tasks.

servicePlans.name: beta
servicePlans.description: For trial purposes only; not to be used in production scenarios

servicePlans.name: free
servicePlans.description: For exploring features in testing environment only; do not use in production scenarios. Only community support is available for this plan and it is not subject to SLAs
